entities.name: witch
entities.description: A beautiful witch is grouped around a person, looking adoringly up at him.

entities.name: centaur
entities.description: A centaur is present in the scene, with glittering jets of water flying from its arrow.

entities.name: goblin
entities.description: A goblin is also present, with glittering jets of water flying from its hat.

entities.name: house-elf
entities.description: A house-elf is in the scene, with glittering jets of water flying from its ears.

entities.name: wizard
entities.description: A wizard is grouped around a person, looking adoringly up at him.

entities.name: Mr. Weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is guiding the crowd towards the golden gates.

entities.name: Ministry workers
entities.description: Ministry workers are present in the scene, carrying briefcases and reading newspapers.

relationships.description: The witch and wizard are looking adoringly up at each other.
The centaur is present near the wizard.
The goblin is also present near the wizard.
The house-elf is in the scene, near the wizard.
Mr. Weasley is guiding the crowd towards the golden gates.
